name: FoodCombinator

”Alexa, ask food combinator what pairs well with chicken”

”Alexa, ask food combinator what combines well with apricots”

Developer Terms of Use
des: With this skill you will be able to combine any ingredient in your kitchen. Just invoke Food Combinator and be prepared to eat the meal of your life.
